Start experiment
-----------------

After all of these settings, you could finally start doing experiment!

* Click RECORD button to start recording raw data, timer will start counting.
  Note all data recorded are raw from device without any preprocessing. The
  recorded data can be found in raw_eeg.csv.

* Click TASK button to start playing task cues to participant. A new window
  will pop out for participant, best practice is to move this window to a
  second monitor for subject to focus only on the tasks.


.. video:: _static/exp_record_1tiral.mp4
   :width: 600
   :height: 500


* When all tasks finish, click RECORD button to stop recording,
  please wait a while for it to save data. When the terminal message
  says it is saved into desired folder, close program.
